marker.ph:
<<Window.DataContext> <lab5:ViewModel /> </Window.DataContext> <Grid Background="##FFFBA86E">
<Menu Grid.Row="0" Margin="0,0,0,389"> <MenuItem Command="{Binding SaveCommand}" Header="Save" /> <MenuItem Command="{Binding ExitCommand}" Header="E_xit" /> </Menu> <ListView Name="WtchList" Width="525" Height="191" Margin="10,62,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" ItemsSource="{Binding Watchmans}"> <ListView.View> <GridView> <GridViewColumn Width="150" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding Name}" Header="Name" /> <GridViewColumn Width="150" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding Surname}" Header="Surname" /> <GridViewColumn Width="100" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding Age}" Header="Age" /> <GridViewColumn Width="100" DisplayMemberBinding="{Binding Weight}" Header="Weight" /> </GridView> </ListView.View> </ListView> <StackPanel Margin="10,365,10,21" FlowDirection="LeftToRight" Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock>Name:</TextBlock> <TextBox Name="NameBox" Width="67" Text="{Binding Path=WatchmanNameToAdd, Mode=OneWayTosource}" /> <TextBlock>Surname:</TextBlock> <TextBox Name="SurnameBox" Width="103" Text="{Binding Path=WatchmanSurnameToAdd, Mode=OneWayTosource}" /> <TextBlock>Age:</TextBlock> <TextBox Name="AgeBox" Width="45" Text="{Binding Path=WatchmanAgeToAdd, Mode=OneWayTosource}" Validation.ErrorTemplate="{x:Null}"/> <TextBlock>Weight:</TextBlock> <TextBox Name="WeightBox" Width="50" Text="{Binding Path=WatchmanWeightToAdd, Mode=OneWayTosource}" Validation.ErrorTemplate="{x:Null}" /> <Button Name="Addwatch" Width="Auto" Margin="10,0,0,0" IsEnabled="False" Command="{Binding AddWatchmanCommand}" Content="Add Watchman" /> </StackPanel> <Label Margin="10,31,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Watchmans List:" /> <Label Margin="10,334,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Add new Watchman:" /> <Label Margin="10,259,0,0" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Content="Change Watchman:" /> <Button Width="88" Height="25" Margin="0,260,23,0" HorizontalAlignment="Right" VerticalAlignment="Top" Click="CmdDelete" Content="Delete chosen" /> <StackPanel Name="UpdList" Margin="10,290,10,96" DataContext="{Binding ElementName=WtchList, Path=SelectedItem, Mode=TwoWay}" FlowDirection="LeftToRight" Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock><Run Text="Name:" /></TextBlock> <TextBox Name="UpdName" Width="67" Text="{Binding Name}" /> <TextBlock><Run Text="Surname:" /></TextBlock> <TextBox Name="UpdSurname" Width="103" Text="{Binding Surname}" /> <TextBlock><Run Text="Age:" /></TextBlock> <TextBox Name="UpdAge" Width="45" Text="{Binding Age}" /> <TextBlock><Run Text="Weight:" /></TextBlock> <TextBox Name="UpdWeight" Width="50" Text="{Binding Weight}" /> <Button Name="UpdButton" Width="Auto" Margin="10,0,0,0" Click="CmdUpdate" Content="Upd Watchman " /> </StackPanel> </Grid>.../>
